00026 class KMCRun : public KMCApplication {
00027     public:
00028         string ProgramName() { return "kmc_run"; }
00029

00031              out << "Runs specified calculators" << endl;
00032         }
00033 
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00038     KMCRun kmcrun;
00039     return kmcrun.Exec(argc, argv);
